metadata.Title: CVE-2015-9274 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: HarfBuzz before 1.0.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid read of two bytes and application crash) because of GPOS and GSUB table mishandling, related to hb-ot-layout-gpos-table.hh, hb-ot-layout-gsub-table.hh, and hb-ot-layout-gsubgpos-private.hh.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> issue added in commit 50b8dc79, version 0.9.39.

criterions.comment: harfbuzz: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
